name: wrap-and-quote-usdc
description: Wrap ETH to WETH and quote the resultant amount of USDC to swap on Uniswap v3

groups.description: Wrap 0.75 ETH to WETH and quote USDC output using Uniswap V3 Quoter
operations: Wrap 0.75 ETH to WETH using function wrap() of IWETH interface [value: 0.75 ether]
Deploy a new Quoter contract using constructor Quoter(address factory) [factory: 0x1F98431c8aD98523631AE4a59f267346ea31F984]

Quote the USDC output amount using function quoteExactInputSingle(QuoteExactInputSingleParams memory params) of IQuoter interface [params: tokenIn=0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2, tokenOut=0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48, amountIn=0.75 ether, fee=3000, sqrtPriceLimitX96=0]
